title: Log NeRF: Comparing Spaces for Learning Radiance Fields
summary: Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) have achieved remarkable results in novel view synthesis, typically using sRGB images for supervision. However, little attention has been paid to the color space in which the network is learning the radiance field representation.
